QuestData.Title: Hyphae Patrol: Heartwood Grove
QuestData.Description: Those masked fiends have taken over Heartwood Grove, and I mean to stop their plans.$b$BHeartwood Grove was so beautiful before. And now, it's... No matter. We're going to fix this, you and me. Right now.$b$BCome, join me in battle. We'll give those monsters a thrashing that will make their masters think twice before desecrating that sacred place again!
QuestData.LogDescription: Ride the fae rings and slay $2oa Possessed Desecrators in Heartwood Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: There, it's done. They should be driven back, if only for a while. I appreciate the help.
